name: PHASEMappedMetaParameterDefinition
desc: A metaparameter that graphs an input value on a set of mathematical curves.

items.name: init(inputMetaParameterDefinition: PHASENumberMetaParameterDefinition, envelope: PHASEEnvelope)
items.desc: Creates a specification for a metaparameter that the app plots on a graph defined by the given set of curves.

items.name: init(inputMetaParameterDefinition: PHASENumberMetaParameterDefinition, envelope: PHASEEnvelope, identifier: String)
items.desc: Creates a specification for a named metaparameter that the app plots on a graph defined by the given set of curves.

items.name: var inputMetaParameterDefinition: PHASENumberMetaParameterDefinition
items.desc: A linear input value to plot on a curve.

items.name: var envelope: PHASEEnvelope
items.desc: A collection of line segments that curve and connect to form a graph.
